data.message: What seems so great is what? A regular everyday person who can care less if your his lil Stan cause he already achieved what he came to do sell records, WOW! But he sold his soul for a few fans, money.. I guess I now understand why he always so mad, he got played and he's from the streets.. Don't mock GOD he's not to be mocked... Jesus Christ is God..

replies.message: Lol... He's not from the 'streets', and who has 'played him' to make him so 'mad'? How are you privy to such information? Funny how nobodies think they know someone from a few records; bitterness is an ugly quality.
